mapper.sql: c.id, c.order_code, c.order_id, c.bar_code, c.urgency, c.member_id, c.card_number, c.clothes_name, c.service_type, c.color, c.brand, c.flaw, c.mobile_phone, c.telephone, c.price, c.status, c.service_fee, c.create_date, c.create_user_id, c.create_user_name, c.update_date, c.update_user_name, c.update_user_id, c.store_id

c.id, c.order_code, o.id as order_id, c.bar_code, c.urgency, c.member_id, m.name as member_name, c.card_number, d.data_name as clothes_name, c.service_type, d1.data_name as color, d2.data_name as brand, c.attachment, c.flaw, c.mobile_phone, c.telephone, c.price, c.status, c.service_fee, c.create_date, c.create_user_id, c.create_user_name, c.update_date, c.update_user_name, c.update_user_id, cf1.opt_date as takingDate, c.store_id, s.store_name, a.area as handOnArea, n.hand_on_no as handOnNo, DATE_FORMAT(cf.opt_date,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') as handOnDateStr,
o.pay_status as payStatus, fa.area as factoryHandOnArea, fn.hand_on_no as factoryHandOnNo,
o.clothes_count, wd.send_number, DATE_FORMAT(w.send_date,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') as sendDateStr, fd.leave_factory_number as leaveFactoryNumber, DATE_FORMAT(lf.leave_date,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') as leaveDateStr
mapper.select: select c.id, c.order_code, c.order_id, c.bar_code, c.urgency, c.member_id, c.card_number, c.attachment, c.flaw, c.mobile_phone, c.telephone, c.price, c. STATUS, c.service_fee, c.create_date, c.create_user_id, c.create_user_name, c.update_date, c.update_user_name, c.update_user_id, c.store_id, s.store_name, c.factory_hand_on_area as factoryHandOnArea, c.factory_hand_on_no as factoryHandOnNo, c.hand_on_area as handOnArea, c.hand_on_no as handOnNo, o.pay_status AS payStatus from store_clothes c LEFT JOIN store s ON c.store_id = s.id LEFT JOIN store_order o ON c.order_code = o.order_code where c.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update store_clothes
status = #{status},
update_user_name = #{updateUserName},
findOrderCode hand_on_area = #{handOnArea},
hand_on_no = #{handOnNo},
factory_hand_on_area = #{factoryHandOnArea},
factory_hand_on_no = #{factoryHandOnNo},
update_date = #{updateDate},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId},
clothes_name = #{clothesName},
service_type = #{serviceType},
urgency = #{urgency},
brand = #{brand},
color = #{color},
flaw = #{flaw},
price = #{price},
where id = #{id}

update store_clothes
status = #{status},
update_user_name = #{updateUserName},
update_date = #{updateDate},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId},
hand_on_area = #{handOnArea},
hand_on_no = #{handOnNo},
factory_hand_on_area = #{factoryHandOnArea},
factory_hand_on_no = #{factoryHandOnNo},
where order_code = #{orderCode}

update store_clothes
status = #{status},
update_user_name = #{updateUserName},
update_date = #{updateDate},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId},
where id in
#{item}
mapper.select:
select c.id, c.order_code, c.bar_code from store_clothes c where 1=1
and c.bar_Code = #{barCode}

select
from store_clothes c INNER JOIN (SELECT o.* from store_order o where o.order_status='5' and o.order_type=#{orderType}) o on c.order_code =o.order_code LEFT JOIN store s on c.store_id =s.id LEFT JOIN store_data_dictionary d on c.clothes_name =d.id LEFT JOIN store_data_dictionary d1 on c.color =d1.id LEFT JOIN store_data_dictionary d2 on c.brand =d2.id LEFT JOIN member m on c.member_id =m.id
LEFT JOIN store_hand_on_area a on c.hand_on_area =a.id and a.hand_type='1' LEFT JOIN store_hand_on_no n on c.hand_on_no =n.id and n.hand_type='1' LEFT JOIN store_clothes_flow cf on c.id =cf.clothes_id and cf.clothes_status='15' LEFT JOIN store_hand_on_area fa on c.factory_hand_on_area =fa.id and fa.hand_type=CASE WHEN o.app_id = 'wx614b63f73b55d7ef' THEN '3' WHEN o.app_id = 'wxc6097b5bf9ba801d' THEN '4' ELSE '2' END LEFT JOIN store_hand_on_no fn on c.factory_hand_on_no =fn.id and fn.hand_type=CASE WHEN o.app_id = 'wx614b63f73b55d7ef' THEN '3' WHEN o.app_id = 'wxc6097b5bf9ba801d' THEN '4' ELSE '2' END LEFT JOIN store_clothes_flow cf1 on c.id =cf1.clothes_id and cf1.clothes_status='16'
LEFT JOIN send_washing_detail wd on c.id =wd.clothes_id LEFT JOIN send_washing w on w.send_number =wd.send_number LEFT JOIN leave_factory_detail fd on c.id =fd.clothes_id LEFT JOIN leave_factory lf on fd.leave_factory_number =lf.leave_factory_number where 1=1
and c.status = #{clothesStatus}
order by c.create_date desc
